commit message: Updated ANT scripts to use 'candymem' instead of 'kidsmem' when possible. Assets afre now downloaded from github...
code refcatorings to simplify things. removed match particles
fixed Makefile to create dirs and always process icons
added timing debug for loader changeable gdx version
can now create a dist jar. publish now works only when in master

code refactoring to remove unused crap and minimize imports
added a mesh for creating shaded backgrounds

using submodules instead of downloading binaries from github.io

add git submodules  missing init

run marm & compo directly from submodule
removed unused shader
verify libgdx integrity before use, because we all know Mario can turn evil any day now ;)
version 1.3: bitmap fonts -> truetype fonts. scaled display -> 1x1 pixels. added color animation to backhround mesh
